Class ShadowPreferenceManager

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowPreferenceManager

@Implements(value=android.preference.PreferenceManager.class)
public class ShadowPreferenceManager
extends Object

Shadow for PreferenceManager that returns instances of the TestSharedPreferences utility class
